description:
For round two of the Jerk Off Contest series, I decided to pit Simon, Eric, Jesse, and Corey against each other. I pulled out the trusty cum table, had the studs line up, strip, and dump their loads. I knew this was going to be close race because a couple of these guys have been known to shoot clear over their shoulder.
There's an alluring reality in watching these straight guys squirm a little in the beginning. They're kind of uncomfortable being naked and sexual around other guys and so there's an awful lot of machismo going on. They're all real nervous at first but then they get more comfortable as the contest progresses.
Which of these four cuties shoots the farthest? You'll just have to watch to find out...
title: Jerk Off Contest 2
